body.p:
Stanford Kentucky
Septr 23rd 1863
Gov Thos. E. Bramlette
Frankfort Ky.
Dear Gov --

A forfeiture and Judgment has been obtained in the Lincoln Circuit Court against Garland Adams in the case of The Commonwealth against E J. James for $100 -- as surety in said James Bail bond, Adams is an industrious honest & poor young man and was over persuaded to go James security for his appearance as James was his cousin and the charge petit larceny -- And I think the case one which deserves the exercise of Executive Clemency.
I therefore hope you will remit one half of said forefeiture as I think he can secure himself in the ballance
My highest regards to Mrs B and the rest of your family

Lincoln Co
vs
Jas L
Garland Adams
Forfeiture
$50,
Remitted 28th Sept 1863

Remit 1/2 fine as requested by Comths atty
Tho E Bramlette
